file.name: 2.1 Path Items.yaml
file.path: OSSNA-OpenAPI-Workshop-2018/OASv3/workspace1/2 - Paths and Path Parameters/exercises/2.1 Path Items.yaml
file.content:
# OpenAPI v3 Training Exercise openapi: "3.0.0" info: version: 1.0.0 title: TaxBlaster API description: | # Exercise: Path Items This OpenAPI 2.0 document has a single `/diagnostics` path item. Please use code assist templates to create the following path items: 1. Create a path item as follows: * path: `/TaxFilings` * GET method, with a response 200 schema in JSON format: reference to the reusable `TaxFilings` schema

2. Create a path item as follows: * path: `/TaxFilings/{id}` * GET method, with a response 200 schema in JSON format: reference to the reusable `TaxFiling` schema

3. Add a path parameter to `/TaxFilings/{id}` * name must be "id" * located in the path * applicable to all methods defined in this resource. paths: /diagnostics: get: description: get diagnostic information about the TaxBlaster service responses: '200': description: OK content: application/json: schema: type: string components: schemas: TaxFiling: type: object required: - filingID properties: filingID: type: string taxpayerID: type: string jurisdiction: type: string fileDate: type: string format: date isJointFiling: type: boolean TaxFilings: type: array items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaxFiling"
